title: How to Build a React Blog with JSON Data
excerpt: Learn how to create a dynamic blog using React that pulls content from JSON files.

content.text: Building a blog with React and JSON data is a flexible approach that separates your content from your presentation layer.
Why use JSON for blog content?
Using JSON files for blog content offers several advantages. It's easy to edit, version control, and can be transformed into other formats if needed.
